title: Biology Game
description: Simulation of anatomical micro world, that society is just like another country, except smaller

title: W is Right
description: Copy of Baba is you, but player needs to change keybind linking to the movement.

title: First Year(万历元年)
description: Go through first 12months as a young emperor of ancient China,experience complex economy of china culture.

title: Social Dilemma
description: Play as the algorithm of social media company, to not get killed by company you need to send post to the users. At the same time, you can see their individual life through the camera, seeing how media reshaped them and twist their lives apart

title: Heart of Gamer
description: An ML program which inputs game as data using MDA to train AI make random games. LLM enables machine to better understand connections between Asthetic,Mechanic and Design(which are considered to be essence of game)

title: 聊斋志异
description: An ML program which inputs game as data using MDA to train AI make random games. LLM enables machine to better understand connections between Asthetic,Mechanic and Design(which are considered to be essence of game)

title: Social Simulator
description: A Society consists of 200 generative agents, gpt faking their conversation based on the personalities and behaviors we input. If it works fine,will make it modable so player can basically simulate any society they want(fantasy/future/ancient/social experience)

title: 为商之道
description: Play as a buisinessman walking in the silkroad

title: SmellyFartChang(臭皮匠）
description: Artistic try towards game media after viewing many artworks, what I did here is just like what filmmakers did towards film in the past century.

title: Arkala
description: A web3 community game for youngsters with mental illnesses, plug-in chatgpt3.5 for potential psychological therapy.

title: Eye of Computer
description: I made this artwork to show how silicon-creature comprehending the world. I gained more sympathy(empathy?) since I put myself in their shoes

title: Swapping Receipts and Recipe
description: Shared Campus project theme of food culture, we didn't think, we got the job done.

title: East Village
description: A murder mystery single player game in which chatgpt play as 6 suspects, player needs to typing to them, combing the clues picked from scene and guess who is real killer.

title: Unfinished supersonic adventure
description: 2d platformer where the scene is completely dark, whenever a sound generates, there will be a visualized soundwave on screen. With the soundwave player can spot surrounding andmoving forward. It's literally unfinished cause we stuck on Unity tech limits, hofully we can get it done one day

title: play shallow, shallow play
description: You need to write a series of game-reviews only by the introductions of game developers, the reviews you wrote will be examined by pre-trained NLP model for the game, two players with opposite opinions will be matched together to make a similar genre game.

title: Tetris Go(围块)
description: Combining Tetris and GO, game tempo increases titanically.

title: Neon Cthulhu
description: Manipulate two screens adn the same time,right screen is internal world of protagonist and left screen is external world.While going to dangerous place player needs to fight physically, while sans too low player needs to fight the monster from internal world

title: car XR Demo
description: A hololens AR unity project I collaborate to make for Bosch.

title: Whose Wife anyway?
description: Multiplayer Generative Beast Racing & Betting.

title: 秦国喜剧
description: Local 2-player face-biting simulation.

title: AR Boxing
description: a 2-player local boxing game using kinect, you need to actually boxing to make virtual avatar fight.

title: covid in kinect
description: Player needs to take away the covid virus from hong kong district, on the background there is news talking about increasing covid numbers.

title: strange tale
description: A recursive text-adventure game where two games happen simultaneously inside the screen and outside the screen.

title: Within one Arm
description: Experimental VR film about experiencing four types of visual impares.

title: a small game
description: A small 2-player fighting boardgame based on boardgame <love letter>.

title: Fix you
description: Procedurally generated cities with photorealistic rendering by Pix2Pix.

title: VR fishing
description: Turn your scribbles into Chinese calligraphy.

title: farming game
description: A stardew valley like farming game.

title: Inception
description: Manual for advanced multi-directional human seating device
